document.full_text: apple inc will stick to plans to roll out its newest ipad on friday to 25 more markets, including france and the united kingdom, even as it fails to meet the high demand for the gadget in the united states.
document.title: apple's ipad 2 heads abroad after u.s. sellouts
lines_and_colors: apple inc will stick to plans to roll out its newest ipad on friday to 25 more markets, including france and the united kingdom, even as it fails to meet the high demand for the gadget in the united states.
